descriptionHtml:
[center]
[line][/center][size=3][b]Installation:[/b][/size]
_Use the Nexus Mod Manager, and note the two versions available.

[size=3][b]Patches:[/b][/size]
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34983]Clothing Version[/url] by psiroflcopter
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31983]Independent Bodies[/url] by ElfPuncher
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24346]Heavy Class[/url] by trumbitta
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22920]French Translation[/url] by BilOut3
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22166]UNPB BBP BBPx Conversions[/url] by MrTroubleMaker
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21621]BBP Patch[/url] by ServantOfSin
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20904]German Translation[/url] by basti675
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17200]Leah Armor Set UNPB-BBP Pack[/url] by xp32
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37778//?]SevenBase Conversion[/url] by Shockero

[size=3][b]Usage:[/b][/size]
_Craft. Color. Temper. Repeat.

[size=3][b]Known Bugs/Issues/Oddities:[/b][/size]
_Nothing game breaking... mostly random clipping.
_Some have reported the Scamp's Bra causing their player's skin to appear burnt. When this happens, it means your game is being stubborn and not loading the race-specific skin texture (read Texture Swap for Creation Kit). Simply un-equip and re-equip the item to make the game do what it is supposed to.
_Certain items like Khantu's Iron Hands, Dandelion's Limb and Vicky's Reinforcement will not show in first person. This is a limitation of the game, not this mod's problem. Only items slotted to 'hands, forearms or body' will show in first person.
_Oh, and the stats are seriously overpowered. Fix it yourself if you're that damn upset.

[size=3][b]Other Works:[/b][/size]
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36780]West Wind Combat Series - Misfit Mage[/url]
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31813]West Wind Combat Series - Assault Armor UNP UNPB[/url]
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21103]Bandanas and Blindfolds Revised[/url] with volvaga0
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717]Temptress Race[/url] with Psychos1s
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22168]UNP - Hmm What To Wear[/url] with Nightasy

[size=3][b]Plays nice with:[/b][/size]
_[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21271]Bouncy Bodices and Booties[/url] by MrTroublemaker and dikr.
[line]
[size=3][b]Credits and Thanks:[/b][/size]

[i]Dandelion Set[/i]
Anano - for the Bra, Limb, Skirt and Stocking meshes > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3496215]Anano's Profile[/url]
Calyps - for the Scrap Plates mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9874]Survivor Cuirass UNP[/url]
Ortog - for the Panties mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10020]Armored Bikini[/url]
Dimon99 - for the UNP Body > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]Dimonized UNP[/url]
*Special thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=182613]Ghostifish[/url] for optimizing the Scrap Plates and Skirt meshes. That and schooling me on all the other bug fixes. ;)

[i]Khantu Set[/i]
Anano - for the Limb, Panties, Stocking and Undershirt meshes > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3496215]Anano's Profile[/url]
Fgem - for the UNP modified Shirt mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16050]Skimpy Armors UNP WIP[/url]
MAK07 - for the Bracelets and original Shirt meshes > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M[/url]
Nightasy - for the Skirt mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9546]UNP Skimpy Armor[/url]
Dimon99 - for the UNP Body > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]Dimonized UNP[/url]

[i]Leah Set[/i]
Calyps - for the shin guard mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12111]Katharinian Barefoot Legguards UNP[/url]
MAK07 - for the belt, bracelet, pauldron and pouch meshes > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M[/url]
Nightasy - for the shirt mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9546]UNP Skimpy Armor[/url]
Petrovich - for the shorts mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16658]UNP Simply Clothes[/url]
Dimon99 - for the UNP Body > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]Dimonized UNP[/url]
*Special thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1255344]Psychos1s[/url] for beta testing the armor and promoting it through his superb screenshots and new youtube channel :)

[i]Scamp Set[/i]
Anano - for the bra mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7736]Layer Bikini[/url]
Nightasy - for the cloak, shirt, skirt and leg straps meshes > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9546]UNP Skimpy Armor[/url]
Ortog - for the panties mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10020]Armored Bikini[/url]
Dimon99 - for the UNP body > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]Dimonized UNP[/url]

[i]Vicky Set[/i]
Anano - for the bra, limb and body straps meshes > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3496215]Anano's Profile[/url]
Fizz99 - for the shorts mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13528]Dark Wind Armor[/url]
Kurese - for the pouches mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13098]Heilige Mutter Armor[/url]
Lautasantenni - for the dwarven necklace > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8361]Expanded Jewelry Crafting[/url]
Liaen - for the pauldrons mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14343]Karliah Jacket Armor[/url]
Ortog - for the alternate bra mesh > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10020]Armored Bikini[/url]
Volvaga0 - for the scouter > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13133]Dwemer Goggles and Scouter[/url]
Dimon99 - for the UNP body > [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]Dimonized UNP[/url]
*Special thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=182613]Ghostifish[/url] for optimizing the body straps mesh

[i]Temptress/Vixen Set[/i]
Dimon99 - for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
Anano - for the collar, sleeves and panties [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3496215]Anano's Profile[/url]
Fizz99 - for the shorts [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13528]Dark Wind Armor[/url]
Calyps - for the arm bands [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12070]Nightshade Armor[/url]
Fraper - for the gloves* and boots* [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5135]Triss Outfit for TES V Skyrim[/url]
Kurese - for the amulet and shirt [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15529]R18Pn Inner Wear Set[/url]
MAK07 - for the arm straps [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M[/url]
Petrovich - for the belt [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16658]UNP Simply Clothes[/url]
Sesamin - for the cloak [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13378]Vanilla Combination Outfit[/url]
SydneyB - for the bracers, stockings and leg straps [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18008]Ashara Princess of the Woods[/url]
